channel.title: How do i let others on my downloaded server?
channel.description: How do i let people go on my server? My server IP is 0.0.0.0, which of course is not a real 1 but it lets me on. How do i make the ip no-ip? I got No-IP Duc, then what do i do? Can some1 give me a step-by-step instructions? Thanks in advance.

item.title: How do i let others on my downloaded server?

@robocz033 wrote:

i reccomend fining a portforwarding tut, cuz to let ppl on u still need to edit the variables and make exceptions. i think there is a tut in the tutorials section. have fun! : )

item.title: How do i let others on my downloaded server?
item.dc:creator: @ghetto_noob ghetto noob
item.description:
@ghetto_noob wrote:

well make a no-ip account and on the left side it should say add new. Click that make a name for your server and it should go into your no-ip Duc. Then you might have to portforward if you know how. If not portforward.com has some tutorials.

Read full topic
